page.title: 11THE VILLAGE OF LYNE
page.content: Lyne village spreads along Lyne Lane and Almner's Road. Holy Trinity church and Lyne and Longcross First School are at the southern end of Lyne Lane with Lyne Club, the Recreation ground and the Royal Marine public house being situated halfway along the lane, just past the T junction with Almners Road. Almners Road begins opposite Fan Court and meets Hardwick Lane and Lyne Crossing Road at Almners Priory. The village is bounded on two sides by the M25 and the M3 motorways, on the third side by St. Peters Hospital and on the fourth side by the MVEE at Longcross.
